product_name: Vasque Velocity 2.0 Trail-Running Shoes - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The rugged women's Vasque Velocity 2.0 Trail-Running Shoes cushion every step and stand up to rough trails with ease. Take them on a long run or even a light and fast hike through the mountains. Highly breathable, lightweight air-mesh nylon and synthetic nubuck uppers feature welded thermoplastic urethane (TPU) reinforcements for structure and pronation stability. Nylon linings wick moisture away from feet and dry quickly. EVA midsoles provide additional cushioning and are redesigned to bring your feet closer to the ground for better control than in the previous version of the Velocity. TPU shanks protect against stone-bruising. Rubber outsoles feature aggressive, multidirectional lugs for superior traction and durability. Reflective detailing increases visibility in low light. Closeout.
short_description: The rugged women's Vasque Velocity 2.0 Trail-Running Shoes cushion every step and stand up to rough trails with ease. Take them on a long run or even a light and fast hike through the mountains.
